Primary Contact: Andrea Sage, Manager of Employment Programs; Phone: 250.317.7864; Email: andrea.sage@jhscso.bc.ca
Service Details: - Provides a 3-week employment readiness program to at anyone ages 16-30 not in school who are experiencing barriers to work- For entry level hospitality or trades work- Provides certificates, workshops and tools at no cost
How to Apply: Please email staff for additional information and to arrange an intake
Major Intersection: St Paul St and Bernard Ave
